txt.en: You have destroyed many pieces of siege equipment in Southern Ithilien and have weakened the grip of the Morgul-host on these lands.
These siege weapons were used in the taking of Osgiliath. They will most likely be deployed across the river as well. Destroying them now seems like a sound idea.
Siege equipment used to take Osgiliath should be destroyed before it is moved across the river.
Siege equipment can be found just outside of Osgiliath in Southern Ithilien.\n\nYou should destroy the siege equipment before it can be conveyed across the river.
